content.rendered:
Miami Swim Week Powered by Art Hearts Fashion Day 3. 

24Fashion TV Exclusive: 

Vilebrequin


Vilebrequin immersed the crowd in the charm of Saint-Tropez, with playful swimwear designs for men.

Vilebrequin Celebrating 50 years of vacation, the French swimwear icon has all the ingredients to feel energized: joy, freedom, the seductive charm of Saint-Tropez back in 1971, and of course, an obsession with durable tailoring playful swimwear design. From fathers and sons to women and girls, ready-to-wear, accessories, and beach games, the House reflects the art of living in the sun all year long. Driven by innovation, Vilebrequin is focused on developing and implementing sustainable solutions, fabrics, and processes that make an impact on vacation, not on the oceans. A commitment made even stronger by the launch of the new Foundation Vilebrequin. @vilebrequin

Model Calzon walks for Vilebrequin

Model Mikey Sheridan walks for Vilebrequin

Fashion model King Julian Perry walks for Vilebrequin

Actor Joey Gutierrez walks for Vilebrequin

Model twins Gemelos Castillo walk for Vilebrequin

Model twins Gemelos Castillo walk for Vilebrequin

Model twins Gemelos Castillo walk for Vilebrequin

Model Owen Lindberg walks for Vilebrequin

Photo by Natalie Svors. Exclusively for 24Fashion TV.
